title: SPONSORED POST: 3 Ways to Use Colored Lighting to Change Your Home’s Mood (Try It in Your Kitchen!)
description: Nothing refreshes a space like color, and one of our favorite ways to add it is often hiding in plain sight: lighting! There’s a whole world beyond white bulbs, and the right lighting can change your room’s mood — not to mention your own — in an instant. Colored smart lighting has evolved into a design tool that’s adaptable to almost any aesthetic. READ MORE...
author: Courtney Balestier
